bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: packing all objects into the bin
goals.2: If there are yellow object and black object together, don't pack a black object into the box

rules.1: it is prohibited to lift and relocate a container
rules.2: when place a rigid objects in the bin, the soft objects must be in the bin before
rules.3: when fold a object, the object must be foldable
rules.4: when push a object, neither fragile and rigid objects are permitted, but only soft objects are permitted
